Title: Add interactive map for activities

Description:
Implement an interactive map on the activities page. Each activity should be displayed as a marker on the map, with color coding based on activity type (e.g., sports, academic, fun). Users should be able to view details by clicking on a marker. Use a mapping library such as Leaflet.js or Google Maps API.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Activities are shown on a map with markers
- Markers are color-coded by activity type
- Clicking a marker shows activity details
- Map is responsive and works on desktop/mobile
